description:
Servant to the church of Almighty Demis and instructor in the Temple Knights` Style of spearmanship, Theodora is a member of the Hero`s party and blessed with the sign of the `Crusader`. She is stoic and devout, loyally following the teachings of the church, yet secretly holds questions to which she will one day find answers.
Source: Official page
name: Theodora Dephilo
